text:
#ISROscientists receive their #firstdose of #Covid19 #vaccine today at #AsterCMIHospital
Dr K. Sivan, Chairman, ISRO, Dr Umamaheshwaran R, Scientific Secretary, ISRO, Dr A S Kiran Kumar, Former Chairman, ISRO & Dr K Radha Krishnan, Former Chairman, #ISRO got #vaccinatedforcovid19 https://t.co/vJhDflfclm
